title: Drawing, "Sangay Volcano Erupting, Ecuador", 1857–62
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on green paper
markings: Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower right:  Lugt 457c
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with accounts at center left margin.
description: Horizontal view across ridges in the foreground and middleground with volcano, visible in the central background, giving off clouds of smoke in already cloudy sky.  Framing lines surround the image.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sangay Volcano Erupting, Ecuador", 1857–62.
1857–62. Graphite, brush and white gouache on green paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-401-a.
